named-native-query.name: MovimentacaoModel.buscaPorContaCorrente
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..Movimentacao where fkContaCorrente = ?1 order by fkContaCorrente

named-native-query.name: MovimentacaoModel.buscaPorCpf
named-native-query.query: select mov.* from NFP_ContaCorrente..Movimentacao mov, NFP_ContaCorrente..ContaCorrente cco where mov.fkContaCorrente = cco.pkConta and cco.strCpfCnpjUser = ?1 order by cco.strCpfCnpjUser

named-native-query.name: MovimentacaoModel.buscaPorSorteio
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..Movimentacao where sor_codSorteio = ?1 order by sor_codSorteio

named-native-query.name: MovimentacaoModel.buscaTodos
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..Movimentacao order by codMovimentacao
